title: It's Time to STOP Funding the Authoritarian State | 9/6/22
description:
Filling in for Glenn, BlazeTV host Steve Deace discusses the current culture war in America, spearheaded by a demagogic president and a manipulative administration. Blaze podcast host of "Conservative Review" Daniel Horowitz joins to expose the Biden administration for selling out the American public and what the latest data says about the side effects of the COVID-19 vaccine. Steve and Daniel discuss the various Nuremberg Code violations our government committed during the COVID-19 pandemic. Rep. Chip Roy (R-Texas) joins Steve to discuss Republicans' chances in the upcoming midterms and the country's current horrific state with Democrats in charge. Mark Meckler, president of the Convention of States, joins to critique President Biden's divisive and dangerous rhetoric and the rise of Democrat fascism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
